com.weemo.sdk.event

Annotation Type WeemoEventListener


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface WeemoEventListener
    Marks a method as a WeemoEvent handler.
    The method must:
    • be public
    • have exaclty one argument of type WeemoEvent (or subclass)
    • return void or a primitive boolean value
    If this annotation is applied to a method that doesn't respect these rules, the method will not be able to be called from the WeemoEventBus.
    The WeemoEventBus will fail fast by throwing runtime exceptions in these cases.
    See Also:
    WeemoEventBus
